verses.text: Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, Take thee a great roll , and write in it with a man’s pen concerning Maher-shalal-hash-baz.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft Maher-shalal-hash-baz: Heb. In making speed to the spoil he hasteneth the prey, or, Make speed, etc\f*
And I took unto me faithful witnesses to record , Uriah the priest , and Zechariah the son of Jeberechiah.

And I went unto the prophetess ; and she conceived , and bare a son. Then said the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to me, Call his name Maher-shalal-hash-baz.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft went: Heb. approached\f*

For before the child shall have knowledge to cry , My father , and my mother , the riches of Damascus and the spoil of Samaria shall be taken away before the king of Assyria.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft the riches…: or, he that is before the king of Assyria shall take away the riches, etc\f* \p
¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake also unto me again , saying ,
Forasmuch as this people refuseth the waters of Shiloah that go softly , and rejoice in Rezin and Remaliah’s son ;

Now therefore, behold, the Lord bringeth up upon them the waters of the river , strong and many , \add even\add* the king of Assyria , and all his glory : and he shall come up over all his channels , and go over all his banks :

And he shall pass through Judah ; he shall overflow and go over , he shall reach \add even\add* to the neck ; and the stretching out of his wings shall fill the breadth of thy land , O Immanuel.\f + \fr 8.8 \ft stretching…: Heb. fulness of the breadth of thy land shall be the stretchings out of his wings\f* \p

¶ Associate yourselves, O ye people , and ye shall be broken in pieces ; and give ear , all ye of far countries : gird yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces ; gird yourselves, and ye shall be broken in pieces.\f + \fr 8.9 \ft people, and: or, people, yet\f*
Take counsel together , and it shall come to nought ; speak the word , and it shall not stand : for God \add is\add* with us. \p

¶ For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake thus to me with a strong hand , and instructed me that I should not walk in the way of this people , saying ,\f + \fr 8.11 \ft with…: Heb. in strength of hand\f*
Say ye not, A confederacy , to all \add them to\add* whom this people shall say , A confederacy ; neither fear ye their fear , nor be afraid.
Sanctify the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts himself; and \add let\add* him \add be\add* your fear , and \add let\add* him \add be\add* your dread.
And he shall be for a sanctuary ; but for a stone of stumbling and for a rock of offence to both the houses of Israel , for a gin and for a snare to the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
And many among them shall stumble , and fall , and be broken , and be snared , and be taken. \p
Bind up the testimony , seal the law among my disciples.
And I will wait upon the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that hideth his face from the house of Jacob , and I will look for him.

Behold, I and the children whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath given me \add are\add* for signs and for wonders in Israel from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , which dwelleth in mount Zion. \p
¶ And when they shall say unto you, Seek unto them that have familiar spirits , and unto wizards that peep , and that mutter : should not a people seek unto their God ? for the living to the dead ?
To the law and to the testimony : if they speak not according to this word , \add it is\add* because \add there is\add* no light in them.\f + \fr 8.20 \ft no…: Heb. no morning\f*

And they shall pass through it, hardly bestead and hungry : and it shall come to pass, that when they shall be hungry , they shall fret themselves, and curse their king and their God , and look upward.
And they shall look unto the earth ; and behold trouble and darkness , dimness of anguish ; and \add they shall be\add* driven to darkness.
